metadata.title: CVE-2024-27390 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: mcast: remove one synchronize_net() barrier in ipv6_mc_down()As discussed in the past (commit 2d3916f31891 ("ipv6: fix skb dropsin igmp6_event_query() and igmp6_event_report()")) I think thesynchronize_net() call in ipv6_mc_down() is not needed.Under load, synchronize_net() can last between 200 usec and 5 ms.KASAN seems to agree as well.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
